lead_paragraph: Following Paul Pogba's reported world record transfer from Juventus to Manchester United for 89 million pounds ($115.90 million) on Tuesday, these are the major world record transfer deals based on pounds sterling since Willie Groves became the first 100 pound player when he moved from West Bromwich Albion to Aston Villa in 1893: (Year, Player, Country, Teams involved, Fee in pounds)

headline.print_headline: Evolution of World Record Transfers Since 1893
headline.main: Evolution of World Record Transfers Since 1893
